quit:
Return to the main menu?
Your progress will be
saved.
clear_data:
Are you sure you want
to delete this save
file? You cannot undo
this!
npc0:
We are the grave-
keepers, and just a few
moments ago we dug up
your body and brought
you back to life.

Why, you ask. The
Great Dreamer told us,
that is why. What are
her motives, that we
do not know.

She rarely needs the
dead ones, so something
bad must be happening.

Whatever is the reason,
you should travel to
the World of Dream.
There is a portal to
the east.

You might find some
useful items on your
way there. Feel free to
take them.
npc1:
This is the Graveyard,
a place where the
dreams come to die.

There is also the Old
Graveyard where we bury
the nightmares - dead
or alive.

Just hope you never
have to go there...
item0:
It reminds you of your child-
hood. What a dummy you were!
